body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Sweet Delights Bakery customer support. My name is Ronald Gonzales. How may I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Ronald, my name is Dorothy Rogers. I’m having an issue with my inventory.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I’m sorry to hear that you're having issues with your inventory, Dorothy. Can you please provide me with your order number so I can take a closer look?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the order number is three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks, Dorothy. And can you also confirm the date of your order?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I placed the order on October twentieth.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Dorothy. It looks like there was a glitch in our inventory system. But don't worry, I've made a note and we'll have the issue sorted out by the end of today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Ronald. That's a relief to hear.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You’re welcome, Dorothy. Thank you for your patience and understanding. If you need any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us again. Have a wonderful day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Ronald. You too! Goodbye.
